title: Maestro Error?
body: really confused why my game is loading or working as soon as i try to load the client is says MAestro Error...........................    PLEASE HELP

replies.body: The server had some downtown last night due to a maintenance.  We provide updates on these on the[ service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, which may be worth bookmarking.  Everything should be online and good to go now!
Did you not read on the top left corner of the client that the servers are down
